title: Keyboard and Mouse are lagging again
body:
Last time I did something with turning off excess processes to make it better...
Ring a bell to any smart person?

replies.body:
You're referring to a clean boot, which you can do by following [this guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq3)

Let me know if this helped!
THanks. Is there any thing I can set up so I don't have to keep doing this? @targons blade

You can enable programs one-by-one on your services list to find what specific app is problematic. Once you've done that, you can either uninstall the app or just ensure it doesn't run when League does.
